comment.body: we'd enjoy the link more with all the utm tracking.. feel free to remove that.
you don't need v6 to run it.. just peer with anyone who does and you have a gateway to v6.

It's in the instructions @Kaffie, you visit IRC to find a peer, or follow any of the guides like:
https://phillymesh.net/2017/03/18/run-cjdns-on-google-compute-engine/
There's also autopeering:
https://github.com/kpcyrd/nightfall
And public peer lists:
https://pad.meshwith.me/p/public
tools:
https://github.com/kpcyrd/yrd
https://github.com/kpcyrd/exit.li
https://github.com/interfect/cjdns-installer (windows)
